subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the founder of Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चिट्टोगर के प्रतिमान कहने वाला कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha is the ruler who founded Chittorgarh Fort. He belonged to the Kumbha Suryavanshi dynasty. The fort was built in 13th century by him.

explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Rana Pratap Singh, was a Rajput Rajput king who founded the Chittorgarh Fort in 15th century. He is the famous warrior and poet.
Pratap Singh, also known as Rana Pratap Singh, was a Rajput Rajput king who built Chittorgarh Fort in 15th century. He was a well-known warrior a poet.
